评论概述: Silky and cozy but wrinkle easily
评论详情: Very soft and cute. Surprisingly warm in winter yet light and flowy enough that I could wear them in summer. The silky texture helps me fall asleep and the fabric is thick and not see through. I ordered 5 pairs of the “striped blue” for my bridesmaids and 1 of those pairs came in a slightly different shade of blue. I figured they messed up the order and maybe sent one “striped grey blue” pair on accident. I decided I’d keep that pair for myself and reorder a 6th pair to make sure I have matching colors for bridesmaid. Unfortunately the color came wrong AGAIN. So now I’m not even sure if it’s a mistake and I think it’s just one of those cheap brands that isn’t consistent in their fabric colors. I’ve tried reaching out to the company directly. But if you’re looking to buy more than 1 I would not recommend as you will not get the same color. Unfortunately I’m now out $180 trying to get the same color pajamas….  ALSO, in my picture, I got 4 of the pajamas on the left (more aqua blue color) and 2 of the ones on the right (more of a sky/dusty blue). Again these were all supposed to be the “striped blue” pajamas. The one of the left that looks aqua blue doesn’t even remotely match any of the product/model pictures. So again, while I love the fit and look of these, I’m doubtful I’ll even be able to get the right color sent to me :(
